medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient presented with severe multi-organ immune dysregulation, which includes new onset ascites leading to a diagnosis of non-cirrhotic portal hypertension (NCPH) secondary to histologically proven nodular regenerative hyperplasia (NRH).
medical_history.past_medical_history: Late-onset Common Variable Immunodeficiency (CVID), severe multi-organ immune dysregulation, splenomegaly, polyclonal lymphoproliferation, granulomatous-lymphocytic interstitial lung disease (GLILD), and recurrent leuko- and thrombocytopenia.
